ol.li: Extends Patient Case Management
Contains exactly one [1..1] employerId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfInjury with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] employerAddress with data type Us Mailing Address
Contains exactly one [1..1] employerName with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] employerPhone with data type Telecommunications
Contains exactly one [1..1] employerPointOfContact with data type Person Name
Contains zero or one [0..1] carrier, where its type is Health Plan
